Das ist mitunter eins der Spiele, die ich innerhalb weniger Minuten (~30) zur√ºckgegeben habe.

Das Spielkonzept ist an sich ansprechend und interessant, aber die Steuerung und das immer Einseitige Spielerlebnis hat mich abgeschreckt.

Man macht immer das Gleiche:

Generator anfangen, abbrechen, Freund retten, Generator weiter machen, selbst sterben, hoffentlich gerettet werden und alles beginnt von vorne.

Selbiges Problem habe ich mit Playerunknowns, obwohl dort wenigstens noch etwas mehr Waffenauswahl herrscht.

Wer auf stupides Monogameplay steht, sollte zugreifen.

F√ºr Leute, die Abwechslung wollen, empfehle ich Alternativen im Horror Genre.

Mapy sƒÖ r√≥≈ºnorodne, tak samo jak i postacie i ich umiejƒôtno≈õci. Na ka≈ºdej trzeba podjƒÖƒá nieco innƒÖ taktykƒô, co pozwala graczowi na r√≥≈ºne formy grania. Chocia≈ºby ukrywanie siƒô i uciekanie lub specjalne prowokanie mordercy, ≈ºeby odciƒÖgnƒÖƒá uwagƒô.

Pomys≈Ç na samƒÖ grƒô, moim zdaniem, oryginalny i ciekawy, chocia≈º wykonanie ca≈Çy czas mo≈ºna ulepszaƒá.

So I'm not a pro player or anything, casual, fun times are what I look for and this game delivers!

It is rare that a game thrills me but knowing that you are being hunted by another player and there is next to nothing you can do about it really gets the adrenaline flowing!

The only issue I have witht his game is that if you want to play as a killer, be prepared to wait 12 years because it's a looooong road. Having said that, it's a road that's fun to travel once you're on it!

Definitely buy while it's on sale!
Please. Don't give this shit company any of your money.

I love this game, I love the idea, I love it's potential.
I don't love the matchmaking. I have been in situations where I was only able to play 1 or 2 matches in 1 hour or more.

Besides that, the game is really fun, and the feeling of being chased by a chainsaw is priceless.

I was gonna give this game a good review but well the new update came out. 

Where do I start...lets start with the good things, shall we? 
Wait... I dont think there are... oh wait! There are jumpscares! Those are fun, right? I mean its fun to hear your friends scream into the microphone after the killer just appears in front of them out of nowhere or if they are being chased

Lets move onto the bad things! 
Matchmaking isn't very good from what I've heard and experienced as both Killer and Survivor. Playing as the Killer is not so much fun since the survivors can troll and make fun of you for not being very good. How? Well they can pallet loop you (this mostly happens at lower rank killers, higher ranks can counter this from what i've seen), they can open up the doors and wait for you to come just so they can tbag you or they can just camp in a locker somewhere on the map after the generators are done and gates are opened just to waste your time.

The last few DLCs all cost money, not even one free DLC. Besides this, the new update arrived with a lot of microtransactions! Yay! You basically pay 5 euro for a pair of shorts when you can get a lot more customizations by buying a DLC instead of using the new currency in game.  Along with this new update there had been some changes to The Shrine, the perks cost a bit more than usual, you seem to get shards a bit slower than normal (you get them by lvling up) and you get a lot less bloodpoints if you buy the perks you already had from the shrine. 

Most of the good and easy killers cost money, of course there are a few free like Trapper which is pretty easy to learn or maybe the Wraith or Huntress...yeah those aren't easy... 

This is what I have to say for now about this game. It can still be a bit of fun here and there but I dont think it is worth 20 euro or 30 euro (if you want the digital deluxe edition which doesn't really gives you an advantage)

If there is anything I missed, if I did some mistakes or if I said something wrong please feel free to reply here, just dont be hostile. ^^

R.I.P Hex Ruin
2016-2020
Also pls fix your servers
Update: They fixed the server took them around 4 years and a half but they fucked up the matchmaking >:(

This game has an interesting  concept. The different killers are very well made in design and the fact that we got licensed killers is a huge plus. The survivers though, not so much. They feel generic and dull. With a group of friends and a couple of beers I can see how this game could have been a get together fun horror party game. But the grinding aspect is horrendous and the maps very bad in design choice. I feel as that is the aspect that make this game bad... As a killer your mission is to place each and every surviver on a hook  (no matter the choice of killer or map) and the survivors role is to repair generators to escape one of several locked entrances. I dont get how People can have thousands hours in this game because the repetiveness is so apparent that after just a few hours you know the concept of game mechanic and it gets boring. I can not rekommenderar this game sadly. The design is awsome, the concept interesting. Optimization of engine is bad and the game mechanics are Dull and boring when playing in longer sessions.
